## Package Overview

"ctrest" is an R package designed to facilitate the use of REST models or REST-RAD models. REST/REST-RAD models are statistical models for estimating the density of ground-dwelling mammals and birds based on video data obtained from camera traps. The package includes the following functions:

### Installation

To install the package, please follow the instructions provided at the anonymous repository link given in the paper.

### Vignette

To view the vignettes (package documentation and tutorials), run the following code:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(ctrest)
vignette("ctrest")
```
